metadata.description: The default name for the DCE is ms-sentinel-knox-dce-[function-name]-[LA-Region]. If you prefer a custom name, please set this flag to true
Default name will be samsung-knox-dcr-[LA-Region], no need to enter if you want to use default names

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: timestamp
columns.description: The time at which the data was generated

columns.name: addon_content
columns.description: userId, admUserId, admPkgName, reason, action, keyMask, pkgName, interfaceName

dataFlows.transformKql:
source 
|where (name == 'TAG_FAILED_TO_WIPE_USER_DATA' or name == 'TAG_WIPING_DATA_IS_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_THIS_USER' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_REQUESTED_FULL_WIPE_OF_DEVICE' or name == 'TAG_PACKAGE_NAME_HAS_BEEN_ACTIVATED_AS_ADMIN' or name == 'TAG_PACKAGE_NAME_HAS_BEEN_REMOVED_AS_ADMIN' or name == 'TAG_APPLICATION_ACTION_FAILED_BECAUSE_OF_SIGNATURE_VERIFICATION_FAILURE' or name == 'LOG_IS_FULL' or name == 'TAG_ADB_SHELL_INTERACTIVE' or name == 'TAG_KEYGUARD_DISABLED_FEATURES_SET' or name == 'TAG_KEYGUARD_DISMISSED' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_CHANGED_NFC_STATE_CHANGE' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_ENABLED_BLUETOOTH_DISCOVERABLE_STATE' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_ENABLED_WIFI_DIRECT' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_ALLOWED_CAMERA' or name == 'TAG_MICROPHONE_ENABLED' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_ALLOWED_MICROPHONE' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_DISALLOWED_MICROPHONE' or name == 'TAG_ADD_UNTRUSTED' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_CHANGED_LOCK_SCREEN_STATE_TO_DISABLED' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_CHANGED_SCREEN_LOCK_TIME_OUT' or name == 'TAG_ADB_SHELL_CMD' or name == 'TAG_BACKUP_SERVICE_TOGGLED' or name == 'TAG_BLUETOOTH_CONNECTION' or name == 'TAG_CERT_AUTHORITY_INSTALLED' or name == 'TAG_CERT_AUTHORITY_REMOVED' or name == 'TAG_KEYGUARD_DISMISS_AUTH_ATTEMPT' or name == 'TAG_MEDIA_MOUNT' or name == 'TAG_REMOTE_LOCK' or name == 'TAG_SYNC_RECV_FILE' or name == 'TAG_SYNC_SEND_FILE' or name == 'TAG_WIPE_FAILURE' or name == 'TAG_ERROR_OCCURRED_WHILE_VALIDATING_PROFILE_INFORMATION_FOR_VENDOR' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_ADDED_TO_CAMERA_ALLOWLIST' or name == 'TAG_REMOVE_UNTRUSTED' or name == 'TAG_APPLICATION_INSTALLATION_NOT_ALLOWED_BECAUSE_SIGNED_UNTRUSTED_CA' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_LOCKED_WORKSPACE' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_UNLOCKED_WORKSPACE' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_SUCCESSFULLY_LOCKED_WORKSPACE' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_SUCCESSFULLY_UNLOCKED_WORKSPACE' or name == 'TAG_KEY_INTEGRITY_VIOLATION' or name == 'TAG_LOG_BUFFER_SIZE_CRITICAL' or name == 'TAG_MEDIA_UNMOUNT' or name == 'TAG_PASSWORD_COMPLEXITY_REQUIRED' or name == 'TAG_PASSWORD_COMPLEXITY_SET' or name == 'TAG_PASSWORD_HISTORY_LENGTH_SET' or name == 'TAG_USER_RESTRICTION_REMOVED' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_REMOVED_SSID_FROM_THE_RESTRICTION_BLOCKLIST' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_REMOVED_ALL_SSID_FROM_THE_RESTRICTION_BLOCKLIST' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_ADDED_SSID_TO_THE_RESTRICTION_ALLOWLIST' or name == 'TAG_ADMIN_HAS_ALLOWED_TO_INSTALL_APPLICATION' or isempty(name)) 
 | extend name = iff(isempty(name), 'SAMSUNG_KNOX_CONNECTIVITY_TEST_EVENT', name),severity = iff(isempty(name), 'low', severity), private = iff(isempty(name), 'TEST_EVENT', private), version = iff(isempty(name), toint(0), version), event_id = iff(isempty(name), tolong(0), event_id)
 | extend PrimaryImei = case(isempty(imei1), imei2, imei1) 
 |extend parsedAC = parse_json(addon_content)   
| extend UserId = toint(parsedAC.userId)   
| extend AdmUserId = toint(parsedAC.admUserId)   
| extend AdmPkgName = tostring(parsedAC.admPkgName)   
| extend FailureReason = tostring(parsedAC.reason)   
| extend Action = tostring(parsedAC.action)   
| extend KeyMask = toint(parsedAC.mask)   
| extend PkgName = tostring(parsedAC.pkgName) 
| extend Allow = tostring(parsedAC.allow) 
| extend Subject = tostring(parsedAC.subject) 
| extend Issuer = tostring(parsedAC.issuer) 
| extend Timeout = toint(parsedAC['timeout']) 
| extend Cmd = tostring(parsedAC.cmd) 
|extend Enabled = toint(parsedAC.enabled) == 1 
| extend PairedDeviceMacAddr = tostring(parsedAC.macAddr) 
| extend Result = toint(parsedAC.result) == 1 
| extend Reason = tostring(parsedAC.reason) 
| extend Strong = toint(parsedAC.strong) == 1 
| extend MountPoint = tostring(parsedAC.mountPoint) 
| extend VolumeLabel = tostring(parsedAC.volLabel) 
| extend Path = tostring(parsedAC.path) 
| extend Signature = tostring(parsedAC.signature) 
| extend KeyAlias = tostring(parsedAC.keyAlias) 
| extend Uid = toint(parsedAC.uid) 
| extend MinNumOfLetters = toint(parsedAC.minNumOfLetters) 
| extend MinNumOfNonLetters = toint(parsedAC.minNumOfNonLetters) 
| extend MinNumOfDigits = toint(parsedAC.minNumOfDigits) 
| extend MinNumOfUpperLetters = toint(parsedAC.minNumOfUpperLetters) 
| extend MinNumOfLowerLetters = toint(parsedAC.minNumOfLowerLetters) 
| extend MinNumOfSymbols = toint(parsedAC.minNumOfSymbols) 
| extend PwdHistoryLength = toint(parsedAC.pwHistoryLength) 
| extend MinPwdLength = toint(parsedAC.minPwLength) 
| extend UserRestriction = tostring(parsedAC.userRestriction) 
| extend Ssid = tostring(parsedAC.ssid) 
| extend eventDatetime = datetime_add('milliSecond', tolong(timestamp), todatetime('1970-01-01')) 
| extend TimeGenerated = iff(isnotempty(eventDatetime), eventDatetime, now()) 
|extend PwdComplexity = case(toint(parsedAC.pwComplexity) == 327680, 'HIGH', toint(parsedAC.pwComplexity) == 196608, 'MEDIUM', toint(parsedAC.pwComplexity) == 65536, 'LOW', toint(parsedAC.pwComplexity) == 0, 'NONE','') 
|extend PwdConstraint = case(toint(parsedAC.pwConstraint) == 32768, 'BIOMETRIC_WEAK', toint(parsedAC.pwConstraint) == 131072, 'NUMERIC', toint(parsedAC.pwConstraint) == 65536, 'SOMETHING', toint(parsedAC.pwConstraint) == 0, 'UNSPECIFIED', toint(parsedAC.pwConstraint) == 196608, 'NUMERIC_COMPLEX', toint(parsedAC.pwConstraint) == 262144, 'ALPHABETIC', toint(parsedAC.pwConstraint) == 327680, 'ALPHANUMERIC', toint(parsedAC.pwConstraint) == 393216, 'COMPLEX','') 
| project-rename Name = name,
 Version = version,
 Severity = severity,
 MitreTtp = mitre_attack_techniques,
 Profile = private,
 DeviceImei1=imei1,
 DeviceImei2=imei2,
 DeviceSerialNumber=serial,
 DeviceWifimac=mac,
 DeviceModel=model, EventTime= eventDatetime, EventId = id

source 
|where (name == 'PREVENT_APP_REMOVAL_CAPABILITY' or name == 'KEY_INPUT_CAPTURE_CAPABILITY'or name == 'SCREEN_CAPTURE_CAPABILITY' or name == 'USER_INTERACTION_CONTROL_CAPABILITY' or name == 'ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_PERMISSION' or name == 'VIDEO_CAPTURE_PERMISSION' or name == 'ACCESS_CALL_LOG_PERMISSION' or name == 'TAG_PACKAGE_INSTALLED' or name == 'TAG_PACKAGE_UNINSTALLED' or name == 'TAG_PACKAGE_UPDATED' or name == 'ACCESSIBILITY_EVENT' or name == 'RESTRICTED_PERMISSION' or name == 'TAG_APPLICATION_INSTALLATION_NOT_ALLOWED_BY_ADMIN_BLOCKLIST' or name == 'TAG_APPLICATION_INSTALLATION_NOT_ALLOWED_BY_ADMIN_INSTALLER_BLOCKLIST' or name == 'TAG_APP_PROCESS_START' or isempty(name)) 
  | extend name = iff(isempty(name), 'SAMSUNG_KNOX_CONNECTIVITY_TEST_EVENT', name),severity = iff(isempty(name), 'low', severity), private = iff(isempty(name), 'TEST_EVENT', private), version = iff(isempty(name), toint(0), version), event_id = iff(isempty(name), tolong(0), event_id)
 | extend PrimaryImei = case(isempty(imei1), imei2, imei1) 
| extend eventDatetime = datetime_add('milliSecond', tolong(timestamp), todatetime('1970-01-01'))
 | extend TimeGenerated = iff(isnotempty(eventDatetime), eventDatetime, now()) 
|extend parsedAC = parse_json(addon_content) 
| extend VersionCode = tolong(parsedAC.verCode) 
| extend InstallerPkgName = tostring(parsedAC.installerPkgName) 
| extend Policy = tostring(parsedAC.policy) 
| extend Uid = toint(parsedAC.uid) 
| extend SeTag = tostring(parsedAC.seTag) 
| extend Hash = tostring(parsedAC.hash) 
| extend StartTime = datetime_add('milliSecond', tolong(parsedAC.startTime), todatetime('1970-01-01')) 
| extend PkgName = iff(isempty(package_name), tostring(parsedAC.pkgName), package_name) 
| extend AdmPkgName = tostring(parsedAC.admPkgName) 
| extend UserId = toint(parsedAC.userId) 
| project-rename  Name = name,
 Version = version,
 Severity = severity,
 MitreTtp = mitre_attack_techniques,
 Profile = private,
 AccessibilityApi = accessbility_api,
 RestrictedPerms = restricted_permissions,
 DeviceImei1=imei1,
 DeviceImei2=imei2,
 DeviceSerialNumber=serial,
 DeviceWifimac=mac,
 DeviceModel=model, EventTime= eventDatetime, 
 EventId = id

source 
|where (name == 'PROCESS_PRIVILEGE_ESCALATION' or name == 'PROCESS_CREATION' or name == 'PROCESS_TERMINATION' or name == 'PROCESS_PERMISSIONS_MODIFICATION' or isempty(name)) 
 | extend name = iff(isempty(name), 'SAMSUNG_KNOX_CONNECTIVITY_TEST_EVENT', name),severity = iff(isempty(name), 'low', severity), private = iff(isempty(name), 'TEST_EVENT', private), version = iff(isempty(name), toint(0), version), event_id = iff(isempty(name), tolong(0), event_id)
 | extend PrimaryImei = case(isempty(imei1), imei2, imei1) 
| extend eventDatetime = datetime_add('milliSecond', tolong(timestamp), todatetime('1970-01-01'))
 | extend TimeGenerated = iff(isnotempty(eventDatetime), eventDatetime, now()) 
|extend parsedAC = parse_json(addon_content) 
| extend StartTime = datetime_add('milliSecond', tolong(parsedAC.startTime), todatetime('1970-01-01')) 
| extend SeTag = tostring(parsedAC.seTag)
| extend Hash = tostring(parsedAC.hash) 
| extend PkgName = tostring(parsedAC.pkgName) 
| extend ModifiedUid = toint(parsedAC.uid) 
| extend ModifiedGid = toint(parsedAC.gid) 
| extend ModifiedEgid = toint(parsedAC.egid) 
| extend ModifiedFsuid = toint(parsedAC.fsuid) 
| extend ModifiedFsgid = toint(parsedAC.fsgid) 
| extend ModifiedEuid = toint(parsedAC.euid) 
| project-rename  Name = name,
 Version = version,
 Severity = severity,
 MitreTtp = mitre_attack_techniques,
 Profile = private,
 Tid = tid,
 Pid = pid,
 Ppid = ppid,
 Uid = uid,
 Gid = gid,
 ExitCode = exit_code,
 Syscall = syscall,
 Path = path,
 Cwd = cwd,
 CmdLine = cmdline ,
 Euid = euid,
 Egid = egid,
 Fsuid = fsuid,
 Fsgid = fsgid,
 Suid = suid,
 Sgid = sgid,
 OwnerUid = owner_uid,
 OwnerGid = owner_gid,
 Atime = atime,
 Mtime = mtime,
 Ctime = ctime,
 DeviceImei1=imei1,
 DeviceImei2=imei2,
 DeviceSerialNumber=serial,
 DeviceWifimac=mac,
 DeviceModel=model, EventTime= eventDatetime, EventId = id

source 
|where (name == 'SUSPICIOUS_URL_ACCESSED' or name == 'PASSWORD_LOCKOUT' or name == 'TAG_PASSWORD_CHANGED' or name == 'SUSPICIOUS_URL_DETECTED' or isempty(name)) 
 | extend name = iff(isempty(name), 'SAMSUNG_KNOX_CONNECTIVITY_TEST_EVENT', name),severity = iff(isempty(name), 'low', severity), private = iff(isempty(name), 'TEST_EVENT', private), version = iff(isempty(name), toint(0), version), event_id = iff(isempty(name), tolong(0), event_id)
 | extend PrimaryImei = case(isempty(imei1), imei2, imei1) 
| extend eventDatetime = datetime_add('milliSecond', tolong(timestamp), todatetime('1970-01-01'))
 | extend TimeGenerated = iff(isnotempty(eventDatetime), eventDatetime, now()) 
|extend parsedAC = parse_json(addon_content) 
|extend PwdComplexity = case(toint(parsedAC.pwComplexity) == 327680, 'HIGH', toint(parsedAC.pwComplexity) == 196608, 'MEDIUM', toint(parsedAC.pwComplexity) == 65536, 'LOW', toint(parsedAC.pwComplexity) == 0, 'NONE','') 
| extend PkgName = iff(isempty(package_name), tostring(parsedAC.pkgName), package_name) 
| extend UserId = toint(parsedAC.userId) 
| project-rename  Name = name,
 Version = version,
 Severity = severity,
 MitreTtp = mitre_attack_techniques,
 Profile = private,
 Url = url,
 ConfidenceScore = confidence_score,
 UrlType = url_type,
 DeviceImei1=imei1,
 DeviceImei2=imei2,
 DeviceSerialNumber=serial,
 DeviceWifimac=mac,
 DeviceModel=model, EventTime= eventDatetime | extend MitreTtp = case(Name == 'SUSPICIOUS_URL_ACCESSED' or Name == 'SUSPICIOUS_URL_DETECTED', array_concat(MitreTtp, parse_json("['T1566']")), MitreTtp), EventId = id

source 
|where (name == 'TAG_NETWORK_EVENT_INSECURE_PACKET' or name == 'SOCKET_CREATION' or name == 'SOCKET_TERMINATION' or name == 'SOCKET_UPDATE' or name == 'TAG_BIND_TO_VPN_FAILED_COULD_NOT_FIND_PACKAGE' or isempty(name)) 
 | extend name = iff(isempty(name), 'SAMSUNG_KNOX_CONNECTIVITY_TEST_EVENT', name),severity = iff(isempty(name), 'low', severity), private = iff(isempty(name), 'TEST_EVENT', private), version = iff(isempty(name), toint(0), version), event_id = iff(isempty(name), tolong(0), event_id)
 | extend PrimaryImei = case(isempty(imei1), imei2, imei1) 
| extend parsedAC = parse_json(addon_content) 
| extend EventDetectedTime = datetime_add('milliSecond', tolong(parsedAC.eventTime), todatetime('1970-01-01'))  
| extend PkgName = tostring(parsedAC.pkgName)   
| extend InterfaceName = tostring(parsedAC.interfaceName) 
| extend eventDatetime = datetime_add('milliSecond', tolong(timestamp), todatetime('1970-01-01'))
 | extend TimeGenerated = iff(isnotempty(eventDatetime), eventDatetime, now()) 
| extend SourcePort = iff(isempty(local_port), toint(parsedAC.sourcePort), local_port) 
| extend RemotePort = iff(isempty(remote_port), toint(parsedAC.remotePort), remote_port) 
| extend SourceAddr = iff(isempty(local_address), tostring(parsedAC.sourceAddress), local_address)
| extend RemoteAddr = iff(isempty(remote_address), tostring(parsedAC.remoteAddress), remote_address)
| extend InetFamily = iff(isempty(family), toint(parsedAC.inetFamily), family) 
| extend UserId = toint(parsedAC.userId) 
| project-rename Name = name,
 Version = version,
 Severity = severity,
 MitreTtp = mitre_attack_techniques,
 Profile = private,
 Protocol = protocol,
 Tid = tid,
 Pid = pid,
 Ppid = ppid,
 Uid = uid,
 Gid = gid,
 ExitCode = exit_code,
 Syscall = syscall,
 Path = path,
 Ja3Fingerprint = JA3_fingerprint,
 SocketType = type,
 DeviceImei1=imei1,
 DeviceImei2=imei2,
 DeviceSerialNumber=serial,
 DeviceWifimac=mac,
 DeviceModel=model,
 EventTime= eventDatetime, EventId = id

source 
|where (name == 'BOOT_COMPROMISED_SOFTWARE_BINARY' or name == 'PERIPHERAL_ACCESS_THROUGH_POLICY_DETECTED_CAMERA' or name == 'PERIPHERAL_ACCESS_THROUGH_POLICY_DETECTED_MIC' or name == 'BOOT_STATE' or isempty(name)) 
 | extend name = iff(isempty(name), 'SAMSUNG_KNOX_CONNECTIVITY_TEST_EVENT', name),severity = iff(isempty(name), 'low', severity), private = iff(isempty(name), 'TEST_EVENT', private), version = iff(isempty(name), toint(0), version), event_id = iff(isempty(name), tolong(0), event_id)
 | extend PrimaryImei = case(isempty(imei1), imei2, imei1) 
| extend parsedAC = parse_json(addon_content)   
| extend BLBuildVersion = tostring(parsedAC.BOOTLOADER_BUILD_VERSION)   
| extend BLBuildId = tostring(parsedAC.BOOTLOADER_BUILD_ID)   
| extend BLBuildType = tostring(parsedAC.BOOTLOADER_BUILD_TYPE)   
| extend KernelBuildId = tostring(parsedAC.KERNEL_BUILD_ID)   
| extend KernelBuildType = tostring(parsedAC.KERNEL_BUILD_TYPE)   
| extend SystemBuildId0 = tostring(parsedAC.SYSTEM_BUILD_ID0)   
| extend SystemBuildId1 = tostring(parsedAC.SYSTEM_BUILD_ID1)   
| extend SystemBuildId2 = tostring(parsedAC.SYSTEM_BUILD_ID2)   
| extend BLMode = tostring(parsedAC.BOOTLOADER_MODE)   
| extend RebootReason = tostring(parsedAC.REBOOT_REASON)   
| extend SecureBoot = tostring(parsedAC.SECURE_BOOT)   
| extend BLEventTarget = tostring(parsedAC.BOOTLOADER_EVENT_TARGET)   
| extend BLEvent = tostring(parsedAC.BOOTLOADER_EVENT)   
| extend BLRP = tostring(parsedAC.BOOTLOADER_RP)   
| extend KernelRP = tostring(parsedAC.KERNEL_RP)   
| extend SystemRP = tostring(parsedAC.SYSTEM_RP)   
| extend ArpDevice = tostring(parsedAC.ARP_DEVICE)   
| extend WpState = tostring(parsedAC.WP_STATE)   
| extend WbFuse = tostring(parsedAC.WB_FUSE)   
| extend WbReason = tostring(parsedAC.WB_REASON)   
| extend ImgStatus = tostring(parsedAC.IMG_STATUS)   
| extend KernelState = tostring(parsedAC.KERNEL_STATE)   
| extend CustomCount = tostring(parsedAC.CUSTOM_COUNT)   
| extend AvbBootState = tostring(parsedAC.AVB_BOOT_STATE)   
| extend AvbDeviceLocked = tostring(parsedAC.AVB_DEVICE_LOCKED)   
| extend AvbOsVersion = tostring(parsedAC.AVB_OS_VERSION)   
| extend AvbOsPatchLevel = tostring(parsedAC.AVB_OS_PATCH_LEVEL)   
| extend AvbVendorPatchLevel = tostring(parsedAC.AVB_VENDOR_PATCH_LEVEL)   
| extend AvbBootPatchLevel = tostring(parsedAC.AVB_BOOT_PATCH_LEVEL)   
| extend VbMetaType = tostring(parsedAC.VBMETA_TYPE)   
| extend UnlockCount = tostring(parsedAC.UNLOCK_COUNT)   
| extend EmStatus = tostring(parsedAC.EM_STATUS)   
| extend EmFuseHistory = tostring(parsedAC.EM_FUSE_HISTORY)   
| extend EmTokens = tostring(parsedAC.EM_TOKENS)   
| extend KGState = tostring(parsedAC.KG_STATE)   
| extend KGFuse = tostring(parsedAC.KG_FUSE)   
| extend FrpState = tostring(parsedAC.FRP_STATE)   
| extend CCModeState = tostring(parsedAC.CC_MODE_STATE)   
| extend MDMState = tostring(parsedAC.MDM_STATE)   
| extend EDLCount = tostring(parsedAC.EDL_COUNT)   
| extend RPMBState = tostring(parsedAC.RPMB_STATE)   
| extend FOTACount = tostring(parsedAC.FOTA_COUNT)   
| extend ODINCount = tostring(parsedAC.ODIN_COUNT)   
| extend AvbVerityMode = tostring(parsedAC.AVB_VERITY_MODE)   
| extend eventDatetime = datetime_add('milliSecond', tolong(timestamp), todatetime('1970-01-01'))
  | extend TimeGenerated = iff(isnotempty(eventDatetime), eventDatetime, now())
 | project-rename Name = name,
 Version = version,
 Severity = severity,
 MitreTtp = mitre_attack_techniques,
 Profile = private,
 DeviceImei1=imei1,
 DeviceImei2=imei2,
 DeviceSerialNumber=serial,
 DeviceWifimac=mac,
 DeviceModel=model, EventTime= eventDatetime, EventId = id
